alert.note: Alert for Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Corpus Christi (Corpus Cristi, Victoria and Laredo)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued December 23 at 6:19AM CST until December 23 at 12:00PM CST by NWS Corpus Christi
info.description: ...HARD FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST SATURDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON CST TODAY... * WHAT...For the Hard Freeze Warning, sub-freezing temperatures as low as 23. For the Wind Advisory, north winds around 30 mph with gusts up to 40 mph. * WHERE...Aransas Islands, Kleberg Islands, Nueces Islands and Calhoun Islands Counties. * WHEN...For the Hard Freeze Warning, until noon CST Saturday. For the Wind Advisory, until noon CST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops, other sensitive vegetation and possibly damage unprotected outdoor plumbing. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Temperatures will briefly rise above freezing this afternoon for a couple of hours, but will drop back into the mid 20s tonight.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects. Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. To prevent freezing and possible bursting of outdoor water pipes they should be wrapped, drained, or allowed to drip slowly. Those that have in-ground sprinkler systems should drain them and cover above- ground pipes to protect them from freezing.

area.areaDesc: Aransas Islands; Calhoun Islands; Kleberg Islands; Nueces Islands
